fw.name: DNBStateInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

method.name: Add3DPosition
method.abstract: Adds the specified 3D Position to the given 3D state as a child.

method.name: Add3DState
method.abstract: Adds the specified 3D state to the given 3D state as a child.

method.name: Assign3DState
method.abstract: Assigns the 3D state to a specified process, based on the given condition.

method.name: GetChildren
method.abstract: Returns the list of all the 3D states or 3D positions or both, managed by the given 3D state.

method.name: GetConditionName
method.abstract: Returns the condition type on which the 3D State has been assigned to a specified activity.

method.name: GetNumberOfChildren
method.abstract: Returns the number of 3D states or 3D positions or both, managed by the given 3D state.

method.name: GetNumberofRelatedActivities
method.abstract: Returns the number of activities/processes associated with the 3D State based on the condition on which the state has been assigned.

method.name: GetRelatedActivities
method.abstract: Returns the list of activities/processes associated with the 3D State based on the condition on which the state has been assigned.

method.name: GetRelatedObject
method.abstract: Returns the product/resource/MA/ASTMA on which the given state is being defined.

method.name: Unassign3DState
method.abstract: Unassigns the 3D state from a specified process.

method.name: StateName
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Name of the 3D State.

class.name: DNB3DStateManagement
class.abstract: Interface representing the 3D State Management in the CATDocument.

method.name: Get3DState
method.abstract: Returns the 3D State object given its name and the object(Resource/MA/Product.

method.name: GetNumberOf3DStatesOnObject
method.abstract: Returns the number of 3D State objects on a given object(Resource/MA/Product.

method.name: GetNumberof3DStatesInActivity
method.abstract: Returns the number of 3D states assigned to the given activity, based on the condition on which the activity has been assigned to the 3D state.

method.name: List3DStatesInActivity
method.abstract: Returns the list of 3D states assigned to the given activity, based on the condition on which the activity has been assigned to the 3D state.

method.name: ListAll3DStatesOnObject
method.abstract: Returns the list of all 3D State objects on a given object(Resource/MA/Product.

class.name: DNB3DStates
class.abstract: Interface representing the collection of 3D State objects.

method.name: StatesCount
method.abstract: Returns the number of 3D State objects in the collection.
